onyomiExamples.meaning: immunity, immunization, immunisation, being hardened (to), being unaffected (by), being accustomed (to)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to escape (disaster, death, etc.), to be saved from, to be rescued from, to avoid (e.g. punishment), to evade (e.g. responsibility), to avert, to elude, to be exempted from
